DOC.brief_summary: Comparing different drugs used in Transversus abdominus plane analgesia after donor hepatectomy. Patients will be divided into three groups; control group, Bupivecaine group, and Dexmedetomedine group according to the used drug
DOC.brief_title: Transversus Abdominus Plane Block in Living Donor Hepatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Transversus abdominus plane block for postoperative analgesia after donor hpatectomy surgery using three different drugs control group, Bupivecaine group, and Dexmedetomedine group
DOC.criteria: all living hepatectomy donors in Mansoura liver transplantation program refusal known sensetivity to used drugs
